title: Real Dads Club Meetings (Man.) 2015-16
desc: The Real Dads Club Meetings are co-hosted by Real Dads Network and The Children's Aid Society.? These meetings are designed for fathers who want to be more involved in the parenting of their children, to develop more effective parenting skills and those who are willing to share fatherhood successes and frustrations to help each other. The Real Dads Club is an opportunity for fathers to support, encourage and learn from other fathers.? Paricipants embrace their role and rights as a parent, and understand their responsibility to raise healthy and strong children with skills to lead productive lives and relationships. Interactive meetings will include discussions, commercial and documentary film analysis, expert presentations, dialogs with Life Coaches, fatherhood problem-solving strategies, conversations with Everyday Heroes, and locating other fatherhood resources. Attend, participate and discover ways to strengthen the Real Dad in you! Please pre-register so that we know you will be attending.? Tell other fathers about participating in the Real Dads Club.
